title: Interview with Dr Christopher R Matthews
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr Christopher R Matthews from Nottingham Trent University - a social scientist and epistemologist who specialises in the use of immersive research to understand ideas, people and society. Christopher talks about his book 'Doing Immersive research Vol.1: Using social science to understand the human world'. You can find out more at immersiveresearch.co.uk and follow Christopher on Twitter too @DrCRMatthews
